title: Universally Human: The High Order Bits
description: The book of Universally Human : The High Order Bits is a collection of lyrical prose about living digital, thinking social and feeling human.  An excerpt from the preface: If one were to dis-intermediate the virtual clothing and accessories that we humans mask ourselves with—culture, religion, senses and sensibilities, technology, and so forth—we would discover that human beings are universally the same.
author: Sri Nagabhirava
